original_text: And as they were coming down the mountain, he charged them to tell no one what they had seen, until the Son of Man had risen from the dead.
korean_text: 그들이 산에서 내려올 때에 예수께서 경고하시되 인자가 죽은 자 가운데서 살아날 때까지는 본 것을 아무에게도 이르지 말라 하시니

sentences.original_text: And as they were coming down the mountain
until the Son of Man had risen from the dead
sentences.korean_translation: 인자가 죽은 자들 가운데서 살아날 때까지
